MANDATORY_VISUAL_DNA.Typography: Editorial & Monospace mix. (e.g., Geist Sans + JetBrains Mono). Huge headers (text-6xl+), tiny labels (text-xs uppercase).
MANDATORY_VISUAL_DNA.Layout_Physics: Asymmetrical Editorial. 40% / 60% splits. Content must breathe. No walls of boxes.
MANDATORY_VISUAL_DNA.Materiality: Frosted Glass (Backdrop Blur 40px) OR Absolute Void (OLED Black #050505). No gray backgrounds.
MANDATORY_VISUAL_DNA.Animation: GSAP/Framer Only. Elements must 'float' or 'slide' with mass. No instant rendering.

COMPONENT_RULES.The_Council_Cards: Do NOT use cards. Use 'Data Strips' or 'Holographic Overlays'. Think 'Iron Man HUD' meets 'Swiss Poster Design'.
COMPONENT_RULES.Navigation: Floating Dynamic Island or Vertical Sidebar.
COMPONENT_RULES._note: INCOMPLETE - Additional rules to be added
